page.title: 04 EDUCATION
page.content: Educational facilities in the Cannock area are provided by Staffordshire County Council and the District is served by a wide range of schools which operate on a two tier co-educational basis. Due to falling rolls Sherbrook & Chenet schools are to amalgamate in September 1986. This will create one of the largest schools in the district with 1800 pupils. The new school will allow all pupils to benefit from the wide range of computer technology,audio-visual equipment and sports facilities which will be available when the schools amalgamate. At the moment the school is unnamed and the school uniform has yet to be decided.
